net.sf.mmm.service.impl.command.server

Class GenericRemoteInvocationCommandCallHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.service.base.server.GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<RemoteInvocationCommand<?>>
      • net.sf.mmm.service.impl.command.server.GenericRemoteInvocationCommandCallHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeReadId<String>

    public class GenericRemoteInvocationCommandCallHandler
extends GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler<RemoteInvocationCommand<?>>
    This is the implementation of GenericRemoteInvocationCallHandler for a RemoteInvocationCommand. It simply delegates to a RemoteInvocationCommandHandler.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)
